verbs.description: [ARGM-DIS: Among other things] , [ARG0: President Trump 's lawyers] [V: admitted] [ARGM-TMP: for the first time] [ARG1: that he dictated a misleading statement about his son 's meeting with a Russian lawyer offering dirt on Hillary Clinton at Trump Tower in June 2016] .

Among other things , President Trump 's lawyers admitted for the first time that [ARG0: he] [V: dictated] [ARG1: a misleading statement about his son 's meeting with a Russian lawyer offering dirt on Hillary Clinton at Trump Tower in June 2016] .

Among other things , President Trump 's lawyers admitted for the first time that he dictated [ARG0: a misleading statement] about [ARG0: his son 's meeting with a Russian lawyer] [V: offering] [ARG1: dirt on Hillary Clinton] [ARGM-LOC: at Trump Tower] [ARGM-TMP: in June 2016] .
